Caption: Prof. K.T.Chandy (Chairman, Board of Governors) delivers the Convocation address and from left on the dais; Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director), Shrimati Indira Gandhi (Prime Minister of India and Chief Guest), Shri K.K. Sha (Governor of Tamilnadu), Shri C.Subramaniam (Union Ministry), Prof. S.Sampath
